Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: இணருழ்த்தும் நாறா மலரனையர் கற்றது உணர விரித்துரையா தார்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Those who are unable to set forth their acquirements (before others) are like flowers blossoming in a cluster and yet without fragrance.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is shown holding a great deal of learning, visualized as a beautiful, intricate, glowing pattern within their mind. They are clearly knowledgeable ('கற்றது').
Layered_Composition.Midground: However, they are unable to explain this knowledge to others ('உணர விரித்துரையா தார்'). This inability is represented by a beautiful, perfectly formed flower that they are holding, but it emits no scent. People are shown leaning in to smell it, but turn away disappointed.
Layered_Composition.Background: A garden filled with other flowers, all of which have visible waves of fragrance, highlighting the singular failure of the beautiful but scentless flower.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A person who has learned much but cannot explain it clearly to others is like a beautiful flower that has no fragrance—outwardly impressive but ultimately useless and unfulfilling to others.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The beautiful but scentless flower ('நாறா மலர்') is the central metaphor for knowledge that cannot be communicated. The disappointed people trying to smell it represent the failure to share wisdom.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Unfulfilling, useless, impotent, a waste of beauty.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: Beautiful, soft lighting that highlights the physical perfection of the flower. The lack of scent can be visualized as an absence of the usual shimmering heat-haze or colored particles of fragrance that other flowers have.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A close-up on the flower and the disappointed expressions of those who try to enjoy it.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with macro details of the flower.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Symbolic still life, with a narrative element.

Cultural_Anchors: Those who cannot explain what they've learned

Negative_Prompt: a fragrant flower, a bad-looking flower, people enjoying the scent, text artifacts.
